response.original_title: When the Saints Go Marching In
response.overview: When the Saints Go Marching In is not an ordinary film. It's a journey, about trust, intimacy, and what happens when people stop performing and simply allow themselves to feel. Antonio steps in front of the camera once again, this time with Serafina, a friend, a muse, and Katy Rose, a woman whose energy changes everything. What began as a creative experiment slowly turned into something real, raw, emotional, beautifully imperfect. From the quiet studio sessions to the first encounter between Serafina and Katy, and the growing tension that follows, When the Saints Go Marching In invites you to feel what happens when passion, trust, and curiosity blend into one story.
response.title: When the Saints Go Marching In
